rBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L

res.rBody:
A facie furoris tui deus conturbata est omnis terra sed tu domine
miserere et miserere et ne facias
consummationem consummatione consummationes

vBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-M CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L

verses.vBody: Converte nos deus salutaris noster et averte iram tuam a nobis
De profundis clamavi ad te domine domine exaudi vocem meam

rep.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L
